Episodes.Title: A Quiet Beginning
Episodes.Director: Masahiro Mukai, Kenji Nagasaki, Tomo Okubo
Episodes.Actors: Daiki Yamashita, Yûichi Nakamura, Tetsu Inada
Episodes.Plot: Using the information Hawks gathered, the heroes and their work study students get ready for an attack on the paranormal liberation front Led by Shigaraki.

Episodes.Title: Inheritance
Episodes.Director: Masahiro Mukai, Kazuma Komatsu, Kenji Nagasaki
Episodes.Actors: Jun'ichi Suwabe, Hiroyuki Yoshino, Sayaka Kinoshita
Episodes.Plot: An enraged Dabi confronts Hawks after Twice's death, meanwhile at the Hospital Endeavor, Eraser head, Crust, Present Mic and X-less finally arrive to help Mirko, who's risking her life to stop Shigaraki's awakening.

Episodes.Title: The Thrill of Destruction
Episodes.Director: Masahiro Mukai, Kenji Nagasaki, Ikurô Satô
Episodes.Actors: Daiki Yamashita, Koki Uchiyama, Hiro Shimono
Episodes.Plot: The fight against the High-End Nomus in Jaku Hospital continues however they are unaware that Tomura Shigaraki has awakened. Whilst this is happening, Tokoyami flies in to try and save Hawks from Dabi.

Episodes.Title: Encounter, Part 2
Episodes.Director: Masahiro Mukai, Kenji Nagasaki, Tomo Okubo
Episodes.Actors: Daiki Yamashita, Tetsu Inada, Nobuhiko Okamoto
Episodes.Plot: Gigantomachia and the rest of the Paranormal Liberation Front gain the upper hand at the Gunga Mountain Villa as the newly awakened Tomura Shigaraki finds a new objective; steal One for All from Izuku Midoriya.

Episodes.Title: Disaster Walker
Episodes.Actors: Daiki Yamashita, Ken'ichi Ogata, Misato Kawauchi
Episodes.Plot: The fight against Shigaraki continues whilst other heroes fight the new Nomus that Shigaraki summoned. Whilst this is happening Team Edgeshot try to stop Gigantomachia from making it to Jaku City.

Episodes.Title: League of Villains Vs. U.A. Students
Episodes.Actors: Daiki Yamashita, Marina Inoue, Saki Ogasawara
Episodes.Plot: The pro heroes' defensive net was broken through. Facing the monstrous giant are the U.A. hero course students. Class A and Class B work together to start a big operation to block Gigantomachia.

Episodes.Title: Katsuki Bakugo: Rising
Episodes.Actors: Daiki Yamashita, Jun'ichi Suwabe, Koki Uchiyama
Episodes.Plot: As Aizawa seems to be out of the battle, Midoriya tries to keep Shigaraki in the air utilizing all of his quirks. Knowing his limit is near, Bakugo comes up with a plan to help him.

Episodes.Title: The Ones Within Us
Episodes.Actors: Daiki Yamashita, Nobuhiko Okamoto, Koki Uchiyama
Episodes.Plot: Shigaraki's attack pierced right through Kacchan. Deku loses himself to his rage and thrust himself to Shigaraki. However, things change suddenly. In the world of One For All, Deku stand against Shigaraki and All For One.

Episodes.Title: Dabi's Dance
Episodes.Actors: Daiki Yamashita, Hikaru Midorikawa, Yûki Kaji
Episodes.Plot: Toga faces Uraraka. They try to understand each other's motives. Meanwhile at Jaku, Machia reaches Shigaraki and awaits his orders. Dabi reveals his true identity to Endeavor and Shouto.

Episodes.Title: Final Performance
Episodes.Actors: Daiki Yamashita, Yasuhiro Mamiya, Hikaru Midorikawa
Episodes.Plot: As Lemillion makes his appearance, everyone gives their best to fight till the end, until All for One takes control over Shigaraki's body and escapes, with the heroes being defeated.
